column2: "Na afe a otsia duebien no mu
column3: bosoom a otsia duebien no ne da a odzi kan no mu no
column4: na EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ
column8: ma sukwadwom do wɔ Egypthen Farao ho
column10: Wɔdze wo too amanaman gyatafɔr ho: naaso etse dɛ abowa kɛse a ɔwɔ pomu; na edze w’esutsen no paapaa mu
column11: na edze w’anan fontaan esu no
column12: na emaa hɔn esutsen no fonee."

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Mebɛtserɛw mo boa mu akata ɔwo na aman pii asafo no do; na wɔbɔtwetwe wo aba sor wɔ mo boa mu."
"Na mobɔtow wo akyen famu
column3: na matow wo akyen sar do
column4: na mama sor nnoma nyina abɛgyegye wo do
column5: na mama asaase nyina do mbowa edzi wo nam amee."

column2: "Na medze wo nam mobɔto mbepɔw do
column3: na medze wo fun ahyɛ mbɔnsa ma."

column2: "Medze wo bɔgyaa so bogugu asaase do ekodu mbepɔw no ho; na ebɛhyɛ esuka no amaama."
"Na sɛ mubodum wo a
column3: mebɛkata sor enyi
column4: na mama no nworaba ayɛ sum; medze nsuwusiw mebɛkata ewia do
column5: na bosoom so nnkɛma ne kan."

column2: "Mebɛma sor nkandzea a ɔhyerɛn nyina ebir wɔ wo do
column3: na mama sum ahyɛ w’asaase do

column2: "Mubohur aman pii hɔn bo so
column3: ber a mebɛfa wo ndɔmmum akɔ aman a innyim do no mu."

column2: "Nyew
column3: mebɛma wo ho ayɛ aman pii hu
column4: na hɔn ahemfo hɔn bo botutu kɛsenara wɔ wo ho
column5: ber a mibenyinam m’afona wɔ hɔn enyim no; na hɔn ho bɔpopo mbertsia biara mu
column6: nyimpa biara wɔ nankasa no nkwa ho

column2: "Na mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Babilɔnhen n’afona bɛba wo do."
"Medze akatakyi hɔn mfona no mebɛma wo nyimpadodow no atotɔ; amanaman mu hɔn a womuo papaapa nyina: na wɔbɛsɛɛ Egypt ne ntsɛn
column3: na woedwuruw ne nyimpadodow no nyina."

column2: "Mebɛsɛɛ no mbowa nyina so mefi esu pii ho; eso nyimpa anamɔn rommfontan hɔn bio
column3: anaaso mbowa ntɔtse rommfontan hɔn."

column2: "Nna mebɛma hɔn nsu enyi agyen
column3: na mama hɔn esutsen apem dɛ ngo

column2: "Ber a mebɛma Egypt asaase ayɛ amamfo na ɔabɔ no
column3: asaase a n’amayɛ nyina abɔ no no
column4: ber a mubokuku hɔn a wɔtse do nyina no
column5: nna wobohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Sukwadwom a wɔdze botwa ewuo nye yi; amanaman mbabaa no wɔdze botwa sukwadwom: wɔdze botwa Egypt na ne nyimpadodow no nyina ho sukwadwom
column3: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔse."

column2: "Ɔbaa dɛ afe a otsia duebien no
column3: bosoom no mu da a otsia duenum no so
column8: twa ewuo wɔ Egypt nyimpadodow no ntsi
column9: na tow ɔno na amanaman atsenkafo hɔn mbabaa no kɛhyɛ daadzetsirmu no ho
column10: nkɛka hɔn a wosian kɔ mona mu no ho."

column2: "Woana na esen no ahoɔfɛw? Sian
column3: na kɛda monomonomfo no nkyɛn."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔtotɔ afona ano no mu
column3: na wɔbɔtotɔ: woeyi no ama afona: wɔntwe ɔno na ne nyimpadodow nyina nkɔ."

column2: "Akatakyi mu ahoɔdzenfo no fi samanadze bɛkasa akyerɛ ɔno na hɔn a wɔboa no no: woesian deda hɔ komm
column3: monomonomfo a afona kunkum hɔn no a."

column2: "Asiria wɔ hɔ ɔnye n’asafo nyinara; ne ndakamona etwa no ho ehyia: hɔn nyinara atɔfo a afona kunkum hɔn a:"
"ɔno a wɔabɔ ne nda wɔ mona mu noho noho
column3: na n’asafo etwa n’adakamona ho ehyia: hɔn nyinara atɔfo a afona kunkum hɔn a woyii hu wɔ atseasefo asaase do no a."

column2: "Hɔ na Elam na ne nyimpadodow etwa n’adakamona ho ehyia nyina wɔ: hɔn nyinara atɔfo a afona kunkum hɔn a wɔdze monomonomyɛ esian kɔ asaasetsirmu no ho a woyii hu wɔ atseasefo asaase do
column3: na wɔnye hɔn a wosian kɔ mona mu no asoa hɔn enyito."

column2: "Wɔatow no mpa wɔ atɔfo no mu aka ne nyimpadodow nyina ho; ne ndakamona etwa no ho ehyia: hɔn nyinara monomonomfo a afona kunkum hɔn a; osiandɛ hɔn ho hu ka atseasefo asaase no
column3: na wɔnye hɔn a wosian kɔ mona mu no asoa hɔn enyito: wɔdze no ato atɔfo finimfin."

column2: "Hɔ na Mesek
column3: Tubal
column4: na ne nyimpadodow no nyina wɔ; ne ndakamona etwa no ho ehyia: hɔn nyinara monomonomfo a afona kunkum hɔn a; osiandɛ woyii hu wɔ atseasefo asaase do."

column2: "Na wɔrennye akatakyi a wɔatotɔ monomonomfo mu no a wɔdze hɔn akondadze esian kɔ samanadze no
column3: na wɔdze hɔn mfona atoto hɔn tsir adze
column4: na hɔn emumuyɛ wɔ hɔn mbiew do no
column5: adeda; osiandɛ hɔn ho hu kitsaa akatakyi wɔ atseasefo asaase no do."

column2: "Na ɔwo so wobobubu wo wɔ monomonomfo no mu
column3: na enye hɔn a wɔatotɔ afona ano no akɛda."

column2: "Hɔ na Edom wɔ
column3: n’ahemfo na ne mbapɔmba nyina a hɔn ahoɔdzen no mu ara wɔdze hɔn atoto hɔn a wɔatotɔ afona ano no nkyɛn: wɔnye monomonomfo na hɔn a wosian kɔ mona mu no bɛdeda."

column2: "Hɔ na kwaamu afamu mbapɔmba no wɔ
column3: hɔn nyinara
column4: na Zidonfo nyinara a wɔnye atɔfo esian kɔ no; hɔn ho hu a wɔdze hɔn akatakyisɛm yii no mu na hɔn enyi atoto; na wɔnye hɔn a wɔatotɔ afona ano no deda hɔ dɛ monomonomfo
column5: na wɔnye hɔn a wosian kɔ mona mu no soa hɔn enyito."

column2: "Farao bohu hɔn
column3: na no werɛ akyekye wɔ ne nyimpadodow no nyinara ho: mekyerɛ Farao na no dɔm nyina a wɔatotɔ afona ano no

column2: "Na mama no ho hu ada atseasefo asaase no do: na wɔdze no bɔto monomonomfo no finimfin
column3: wɔ hɔn a wɔtotɔ afona ano no nkyɛn
column4: mekyerɛ Farao na ne nyimpadodow no nyina
